P1 Project Requirements

Håvard, Runar, Petter, Thomas

Friday 23.09.2016

The client

Client: Ad Infinitum (that's us)

We're a group of four which wanted to create a website about something we are passionate about; building PCs. The website name will be "Build a PC".

Purpose and Goals

There are people out there that doesn't know how to build a PC. We think these people deserve to know how to, so our purpose it to try and teach them. Our goal is to teach everyone how to do it. The site will provide information about what the parts of the computer does, which products to consider when buying parts, how to assemble it and which OS to pick.

Audience

The website's main audience will be the people that doen't already know how to build a PC, but wants to know.

Content Organization

The site will consist of four sections plus a home page, where each section will consist of minimum one page.

Home page: Our mission

Sections:

  1. About the parts: Will explain in minor detail how each of the parts of a PC work.
  2. Comparison of parts currently on the market: Will compare prices and specs. of the parts currently on the market.
  3. How to assemble the PC: How to connect the parts together.
  4. Choosing an operatins system: Comparison of operating systems and installation instructions.

Location of Website

The website will be hosted on GitHub Pages under the subdomain build-a-pc.github.io.
